1 eng Hello world.
3 eng What's your name?
5 eng My name is Tom.
7 eng My name is not Tom.
9 eng My brother's name is Tom.
11 eng My brother's name is not Tom.
13 eng Hello Tom.
15 eng What's your brother's name?
17 eng Is Tom your brother?
19 eng Yes, Tom is my brother.
21 eng No, Tom is not my brother.
23 eng Yes, my brother's name is Tom.
25 eng No, my brother's name is not Tom.
